# Heimr.ai Wiki

Welcome to the comprehensive documentation for Heimr.ai.

## ðŸ“š Documentation Index

### 1. [Quick Start Guide](wiki/01-quickstart.md)
   Get up and running in under 5 minutes. Installation, first analysis, and configuration.

### 2. [Architecture](wiki/02-architecture.md)
   Learn how Heimr's pipeline works and understand the core components (Parsers, Anomaly Detector, LLM Client).

### 3. [CLI Reference](wiki/03-cli-reference.md)
   Command-line reference for `heimr analyze` and `heimr config-init`.

### 4. [Configuration](wiki/04-configuration.md)
   Configuration guide and `heimr.yaml` reference for observability sources and LLM settings.

### 5. [AI Analysis Engine](wiki/05-ai-analysis-engine.md)
   Deep dive into the **Context Stuffing** architecture, Multi-Modal Signal Aggregation, and supported Model Tiers (local and cloud).

### 6. [Python API](wiki/06-python-api.md)
   Programmatic usage for custom integrations, CI/CD scripts, and advanced workflows.

### 7. [Reporting](wiki/07-reporting.md)
   Overview of all generated artifacts: Markdown reports, PDFs, and CI/CD summaries.

### 8. [CI/CD Integration](wiki/08-ci-cd-integration.md)
   Guide for integrating Heimr into GitHub Actions, Jenkins, and GitLab CI with performance gating and reporting.

### 9. [Failure Scenarios](wiki/09-failure-scenarios.md)
   Comprehensive list of 140+ detectable failure patterns across API, DB, Infra, and more.

### 10. [Troubleshooting](wiki/10-troubleshooting.md)
   Common issues and fixes (Parser errors, LLM connection failures, OOM, CI/CD issues).
